page.title: 13Trade and Industry
page.content: East Dean Stores and Post Office is a grocers ,off licence newsagency and garden nursery. They deliver locally and are open seven days a week. Sole employees are the proprietors and their son. Stevens Taxi Service have one car. Mrs stevens helped by her husband drives approximately two hundred miles a week. They use facilities in the neighbouring garagae to do thei servicing. East Dean Service Station sells petrol and second hand cars. It is open thirty hours a week. West dean Joinery administer business from their sons home. They employ seven self employed carpenters plus temporary staff.
